    • Field Detail

      • defaultName

        public static java.lang.String defaultName
        Stores the default name for tools.

        Set to "toolName".

      • defaultDescription

        public static java.lang.String defaultDescription
        Stores the default description for tools.

        Set to "A tool".

      • defaultDurability

        public static int defaultDurability
        Stores the default durability(Number of uses) for tools.

        Set to 100 (100 uses).

      • ITEMTYPE

        private final java.lang.String ITEMTYPE
        Stores the item type for tools. Cannot be changed.

        Set to "tool".

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        Stores the name of this tool.

        Set to defaultName.

      • description

        private java.lang.String description
        Stores the description of this tool.

        Set to defaultDescription.

      • durability

        private int durability
        Stores the durability(number of uses) of this tool.

        Set to defaultDurability.

      • customVariables

        private java.util.ArrayList<CustomVariable> customVariables
        Stores the custom variables for this tool.

        Set to an empty ArrayList of CustomVariables.

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomVariableFromName

        public java.lang.Object getCustomVariableFromName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the value of the custom variable in customVariables with the name given.

        If name is null, or no variable with that name is found, return null.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the custom variable.
        Returns:
        The value of the customvariable with the name given. If no name given or one not found, return null.

      • setCustomVariableByName

        public void setCustomVariableByName(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the value of the variable in customVariables with the name given.

        If no name given, then dont do anything.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the custom variable.
        value - The value that the custom variable will be set to.

      • getItemType

        public java.lang.String getItemType()
        Returns the ITEMTYPE.

        public void setName(java.lang.String s)

        If the name given is null, then dont do anything.

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(java.lang.String s)
        Sets the value of description.

        If the value is null, then set the description to the defaultDescription.

        Overrides:
        setDescription in class Item
        Parameters:
        s - The new value.

      • getDurability

        public int getDurability()

      • setDurability

        public void setDurability(int a)
        Returns the durability.

        If the new value is less than 1, then it breaks.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value

      • increaseDurability

        public void increaseDurability(int a)
        Sets the value of durability.

        If the new value is less than 1, then it breaks.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • decreaseDurability

        public void decreaseDurability(int a)
        Increases the value of durability.

        If the new value is less than 1, then it breaks.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • getSimpleOutput

        public java.lang.String getSimpleOutput()
        Returns the name, ITEMTYPE, and durability.
        Returns:
        name, ITEMTYPE, and durability

      • getOutput

        public java.lang.String getOutput()
        Returns the name, description, ITEMTYPE, durability and any customVariables with inOutput to true.

        name, description, ITEMTYPE, durability and any customVariables with inOutput to true.
